channel.title: [PI] How Do You Remove Custom Quests From Quest List?
channel.description: How do you remove quests from your quest tab? Like every quest? I have two custom quests in there which I'm not sure how to remove.

item.description:
@adamknightz wrote:

[quote=“Ecstacy Pkz, post:5, topic:381821”]Go to server -> Model -> Players -> Playerassistant.java

Search for

public void handleLoginText() {

Underneath that you should see something like this
